channel.description: Recent content in Rpg-Blog-Carnival on Space·Time Will Tell

item.title: Ronin Time Bureaucrats: Afterlife and the Time Adjustment Foundation
item.description: While the Time Federation is forever limited by its Prime Directive, the militarist branches managed to get away with murder, kidnapping and torture by finessing paradoxes. Some cadres of the Time Federation wanted the ability to counter-attack, and managed to create a covert operations branch called the Time Adjustment Foundation. And further is exactly where it goes.

item.title: Ronin Time Bureaucrats: Is there an afterlife?
item.description:
Is there an afterlife?

Why, of course, there is, and you came to the right place!
